mapper.sql: ORG_DAY_STATISTICS_ID orgDayStatisticsId, STATISTICS_RECORD_ID statisticsRecordId, ORG_ID orgId, ORG_NAME orgName, REGION_ID regionId, REGION_NAME regionName, ITEM_ID itemId, ITEM_NAME itemName, APPLYINST_SOURCE applyinstSource, DAY_APPLY_COUNT dayApplyCount, ALL_APPLY_COUNT allApplyCount, APPLY_LRR applyLrr, ALL_IN_SUPPLEMENT_COUNT allInSupplementCount, ALL_SUPPLEMENTED_COUNT allSupplementedCount, DAY_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT dayAcceptanceCount, ALL_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT allAcceptanceCount, ACCEPTANCE_LRR acceptanceLrr, DAY_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT dayOutScopeCount, ALL_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT allOutScopeCount, OUT_SCOPE_LRR outScopeLrr, DAY_COMPLETED_COUNT dayCompletedCount, ALL_COMPLETED_COUNT allCompletedCount, COMPLETED_LRR completedLrr, DAY_SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_COUNT daySpecificRoutineCount, ALL_SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_COUNT allSpecificRoutineCount, SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_LRR specificRoutineLrr, ALL_WARINING_COUNT allWariningCount, DAY_OVER_TIME_COUNT dayOverTimeCount, ALL_OVER_TIME_COUNT allOverTimeCount, OVER_TIME_LRR overTimeLrr, ALL_ACCEPTANCE_RATE allAcceptanceRate, ALL_OUT_SCOPE_RATE allOutScopeRate, ALL_OVER_TIME_RATE allOverTimeRate, ALL_COMPLETED_RATE allCompletedRate, STATISTICS_DATE statisticsDate, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.update:
update AEA_ANA_ORG_DAY_STATISTICS
ORG_DAY_STATISTICS_ID = #{orgDayStatisticsId},
STATISTICS_RECORD_ID = #{statisticsRecordId},
ORG_ID = #{orgId},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName},
REGION_ID = #{regionId},
REGION_NAME = #{regionName},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName},
APPLYINST_SOURCE = #{applyinstSource},
DAY_APPLY_COUNT = #{dayApplyCount},
ALL_APPLY_COUNT = #{allApplyCount},
APPLY_LRR = #{applyLrr},
ALL_IN_SUPPLEMENT_COUNT = #{allInSupplementCount},
ALL_SUPPLEMENTED_COUNT = #{allSupplementedCount},
DAY_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT = #{dayAcceptanceCount},
ALL_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT = #{allAcceptanceCount},
ACCEPTANCE_LRR = #{acceptanceLrr},
DAY_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT = #{dayOutScopeCount},
ALL_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT = #{allOutScopeCount},
OUT_SCOPE_LRR = #{outScopeLrr},
DAY_COMPLETED_COUNT = #{dayCompletedCount},
ALL_COMPLETED_COUNT = #{allCompletedCount},
COMPLETED_LRR = #{completedLrr},
DAY_SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_COUNT = #{daySpecificRoutineCount},
ALL_SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_COUNT = #{allSpecificRoutineCount},
SPECIFIC_ROUTINE_LRR = #{specificRoutineLrr},
ALL_WARINING_COUNT = #{allWariningCount},
DAY_OVER_TIME_COUNT = #{dayOverTimeCount},
ALL_OVER_TIME_COUNT = #{allOverTimeCount},
OVER_TIME_LRR = #{overTimeLrr},
ALL_ACCEPTANCE_RATE = #{allAcceptanceRate},
ALL_OUT_SCOPE_RATE = #{allOutScopeRate},
ALL_OVER_TIME_RATE = #{allOverTimeRate},
ALL_COMPLETED_RATE = #{allCompletedRate},
STATISTICS_DATE = #{statisticsDate},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where ORG_DAY_STATISTICS_ID = #{orgDayStatisticsId}
mapper.select:
SELECT CONCAT(CAST(round(temp.notAcceptRate * 100,1) AS CHAR), '%') as notAcceptRate, CONCAT(CAST(round(temp.overdueRate * 100,1) AS CHAR), '%') as overdueRate, temp.ORG_ID as orgId, temp.ORG_NAME as orgName, temp.ITEM_ID as itemId, temp.ITEM_NAME as itemName, (@i := @i + 1) as sortNo from ( SELECT aaods.ORG_ID, aaods.ORG_NAME, aaods.ITEM_ID, aaods.ITEM_NAME, sum(aaods.ALL_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT) / (sum(aaods.ALL_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT) + sum(aaods.ALL_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT)) notAcceptRate, sum(aaods.ALL_OVER_TIME_COUNT) / sum(aaods.ALL_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT) overdueRate, sum(aaods.ALL_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT) / (sum(aaods.ALL_OUT_SCOPE_COUNT) + sum(aaods.ALL_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT)) + sum(aaods.ALL_OVER_TIME_COUNT) / sum(aaods.ALL_ACCEPTANCE_COUNT) allUnusualRate
from aea_ana_org_day_statistics aaods where 1 = 1 and aaods.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} group by aaods.ITEM_ID,aaods.ORG_ID ) temp, (SELECT @i := 0) AS it
ORDER BY temp.allUnusualRate desc

SELECT SUM(aaods.DAY_COMPLETED_COUNT) as areaCount, REGION_NAME as regionName, REGION_ID as regionId from aea_ana_org_day_statistics aaods where aaods.STATISTICS_DATE >= #{startTime} and aaods.STATISTICS_DATE <= #{endTime} group by REGION_ID, REGION_NAME
